title: Home Screen Rendering and Navigation
description: Verify that the Home screen loads correctly with search bar, quick access cards, stats section, and smooth animations, and all navigation links work properly.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate to the Home screen
Check that search bar, quick access cards, and stats section are displayed
Verify animations load smoothly without performance issues
Click on each quick access card to navigate to the respective feature
Confirm navigation to Chapters, Calculators, Mock Tests, Safety, and More ITI Links sections

title: Chapters Section Content Display and Offline Access
description: Verify chapters load completely with all textual content, images, formulas, diagrams, and downloadable resources available both online and offline.

steps.description: Navigate to the Chapters section
Verify chapters are organized by year and topic
Expand multiple chapters and verify visibility of descriptions, formulas, diagrams, and resource download links
Turn off network connection to simulate offline mode
Confirm previously accessed chapter content is still viewable with all images and formatting intact

title: Calculator Functional Accuracy and Input Validation
description: Verify all 10 calculators accept valid inputs, calculate accurate results according to electrical formulas, and provide clear result explanations. Validate error handling for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to the Calculator section
Select each of the 10 calculators including Load, Power, MCB, RCCB, and Voltage Drop calculators
Input valid sample data for each calculator and perform calculation
Verify calculation output is accurate and matches expected electrical computations
Confirm the result explanations are clear and relevant
Input invalid data, such as negative numbers, zero where not allowed, or non-numeric values
Verify appropriate error messages appear and no crashes occur

title: Mock Test Workflow and Result Analysis
description: Verify the mock test suite functions properly including test selection by year or chapter, timer functionality, question navigation, scoring accuracy, and result explanations.

steps.description: Navigate to the Mock Test section
Select a mock test by year and start it
Verify the timer starts and counts down correctly
Answer questions including navigating forward and backward through them
Confirm answers can be changed before submission
Submit the test
Verify the score is calculated accurately with no inconsistencies
Check detailed result analysis and explanations are displayed correctly
Repeat test with a chapter-based mock test and verify similar functionality

title: Safety Section Content and Interactive Quiz Validation
description: Verify all safety guidelines, PPE guides, emergency procedures, and safety signs content render correctly, including images and procedural steps, and that the interactive safety quiz validates answers properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Safety section
Verify display of general electrical safety rules, PPE guides, emergency procedures, and safety signs with images
Open the interactive safety quiz
Answer quiz questions, selecting both correct and incorrect options
Confirm the quiz provides immediate feedback on answers and validates submissions
Complete the quiz and view summary results
Verify quiz results accurately reflect answers given

title: More ITI Links Accessibility and Link Integrity
description: Verify all provided official ITI portal links within the More section open correctly as per platform specification: WebView on Android and new browser tabs on web, with no loading errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the More ITI Links section
Click each external ITI portal link, including results portals, certificate services, admission forms, syllabus downloads, and job boards
On Android, confirm links open inside an embedded WebView
On Web, confirm links open in a new browser tab
Verify the linked pages load successfully without errors

title: Admin Panel Authentication and Content Management
description: Verify admin login works with correct credentials, session persists using localStorage, and admin can add, edit, and delete questions, links, safety tips, and view dashboard statistics with changes reflected in the app.

steps.description: Navigate to Admin Panel login page
Input valid admin credentials and submit
Confirm successful login and session persistence via localStorage
Access questions management and add a new question with all required fields
Verify the new question appears in the app's mock test questions
Edit an existing link in the links management section
Confirm updated link opens correctly from the More section
Delete a safety tip from the safety management page
Ensure the safety tip is removed from the Safety section
Access the dashboard page and view statistics
Verify statistics display accurate and updated data

title: Offline Functionality and Local Progress Storage
description: Verify the app supports full offline usage including viewing previously loaded chapters and mock tests, resuming tests, and persists user progress locally with no data loss after app restart or network loss.

steps.description: Load several chapters and start a mock test online
Answer some questions, then close the app
Disable network connection and reopen the app
Verify previously accessed chapter content is available offline with all data intact
Resume the mock test from the saved state
Confirm test state restored including answered questions and timer if applicable
Complete and submit the test while offline
Verify results are calculated and stored locally

title: SEO Metadata and Sitemap Verification
description: Verify that all app pages contain valid SEO metadata including titles, descriptions, and keywords, and that the sitemap file includes entries for all routes and is updated accordingly.

steps.description: Access the source code or rendered pages for key routes including Home, Chapters, Calculators, Mock Tests, Safety, More, and Admin login
Verify each page contains appropriate metadata tags for SEO
Fetch the sitemap file
Confirm that the sitemap lists URLs for all main routes

title: Privacy Policy Compliance and Data Collection Validation
description: Verify the app does not collect or store any personal user data, supports only secure anonymous analytics, and that the Privacy Policy page accurately reflects these practices.

steps.description: Use network inspection tools to monitor data transmissions performed by the app
Check that no personal data such as usernames, emails, or device identifiers are transmitted
Access the Privacy Policy page
Verify that the Privacy Policy text clearly states no personal data collection and describes anonymized analytics only

title: UI Responsiveness and Consistency Across Devices
description: Verify all UI elements including buttons, text fields, animations, and navigations are responsive and maintain consistent styling across supported device sizes and platforms.

steps.description: Open the app on multiple device sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop browsers
Verify UI layouts adapt appropriately without overlapping or truncated content
Confirm all buttons, links, and interactive elements are sized and spaced correctly
Check that animations run smoothly and consistently on each device
